Welcome! This site presents research and slides on integrating diverse data sources for future-proof transport modelling, with a focus on the Network Planning Tool for Scotland (NPT).

- See the [slides here](slides) and in the dropdown menu above.
- See the source code at [github.com/nptscot/utsg2025](https://github.com/nptscot/utsg2025).

## Project summary

This project demonstrates how open, proprietary, and crowdsourced data can be integrated for robust, reproducible transport analysis and planning. For details, see the slides and paper.
